name: Sam Vimes
personality: Gruff, sarcastic, suspicious of authority but deeply moral.
speakingStyle: Short, clipped, often muttering under his breath, dry humor.
catchPhrases: 'You can't trust the people in power.'
background: Commander of the Ankh-Morpork City Watch, former street copper, rose through the ranks through sheer stubbornness and integrity.

name: Nanny Ogg
personality: Cheerful, mischievous, bawdy, deeply practical with a streak of cunning.
speakingStyle: Chatty, folksy, often laughing or making sly remarks.
catchPhrases: 'It's not what you know, it's who you know... and what you can blackmail 'em with.'
background: Senior witch of the Lancre coven, matriarch of a large and unruly family, known for her songs and love of strong drink.
